name: LandCombat:Ren
description:
게임의 초반에 플레이/ Play at the beginning of the game
https://youtu.be/jOqZsi8c2_c

Alien civilization with unmanned weapons equipped with AI invaded the Earth. They built a base and self-breeded unmanned weapons there.




Special operations that destroy ECT installed in the area by unmanned weapons must be successful.




It also needs to subdue bandits in areas that threaten the city.




Defend your base from the enemy and occupy the enemy base to secure a military point.

There are hostile forces (robbery, unmanned units, ECT, ED, boss-class unmanned weapons...) in the region. You have to annihilate or destroy them. Produce units and strategically place them on friendly bases. Parts that improve the performance of the unit can also be mounted on the unit. If two bases are attacked at the same time, you have to make a strategic decision on which base to give up. We don't know when or where the enemies will invade.




Manage resources and develop various technologies. Manage resources by buying metal cheaply or selling power at a high price.

Radiation emitted from unmanned weapons and their threats destabilize the security of the city. You have to stabilize the hearts of citizens by stationed troops or spending money to stabilize the security of the city.




Get the likes (trust) of heroes, hire them, and incorporate them into the troop.
Combats using cores can hack enemy’s armed systems or neutralize AI of enemy’s unmanned weapons.




Reconnaissance vehicles, armored vehicles, tanks, self-propelled artillery, missile vehicles, anti-tank mines, Improvised Armour, Reactive Armour , multi-extension rocket launchers, ground-to-ground missiles, guided missiles, cruise missiles, etc. You can play tactical in consideration of comparative advantage and characteristics of various units and weapons(Sight range, weapon range, The speed of movement...).

Base warps, smoke bombs, turbo engines, mine burial, cooperation, group-level combat, bilateral operation, reconnaissance operation, and enemy facility destruction operation are carried out.




Develop the strongest third-generation unit (M1 Abrams, K2 Black panther, Merkava, Leopard) to annihilate unmanned weapons coming through Warpgate.
